definition: to screen/to block (sth or sb)/to shield/(protective) shield
to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)

sentences.english: To find out, hold a pencil up in front of you and block out the flaps.
sentences.chinese: 要寻找答案，拿根铅笔在面前屏蔽掉这些旗。

sentences.english: Masking a trace helps to minimize the amount of information that is captured.
sentences.chinese: 通过屏蔽跟踪，有助于减少所捕捉的信息量。

sentences.english: Conductor screen is formed by extruded semi-conducting layer or wrapped with semi-conducting tapes and semi-conducting layer.
sentences.chinese: 绝缘采用超净交联聚乙烯绝缘料挤包在导体屏蔽上。

sentences.english: The robust RJ45 connectors are also shielded against electrical interference.
sentences.chinese: 强劲的RJ45连接器也屏蔽防止电波干扰。

sentences.english: The influence of double_percolation phenomenon on shielding effectiveness of the rubber was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 结合二次渗滤现象，分析了其对屏蔽性能的影响。

sentences.english: A simple method for the estimation of the transverse shielding for intense- beam proton linac was described briefly.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了估算强流质子直线加速器横向屏蔽的方法。

sentences.english: The result indicates that the two-loop correction decreases the Debye screening mass.
sentences.chinese: 其结果显示双圈修正减少了德拜屏蔽质量。

sentences.english: This fixture also shields the sample from electrostatic interference.
sentences.chinese: 此装置还对样品进行屏蔽，使其不受静电干扰的影响。

sentences.english: In addition, the Canned Motor rotation direction can be automatically detected.
sentences.chinese: 此外，屏蔽电泵的转动方向也能自动检测。

sentences.english: Ray shielding can play a role when Xray room is completely closed.
sentences.chinese: 光室必须完全闭合才能起到屏蔽射线的作用。

sentences.english: Each module with antenna can be used as a single jammer.
sentences.chinese: 每一个带天线的模块可单独作为某频段的屏蔽器使用。

sentences.english: Kristof began testing what topics would be censored.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯托夫开始测试哪些议题将被屏蔽。

sentences.english: From the cross points through the elbow shielded region, the geometric attenuation can be rapidly determined in advance.
sentences.chinese: 由这肘形屏蔽领域的交点可快速预测辐射屏蔽衰减率。

sentences.english: From the cross points through the elbow shielded region, the geometric attenuation can be rapidly determined in advance.
sentences.chinese: 由这肘形屏蔽领域的交点可快速预测辐射屏蔽衰减率。

sentences.english: Shielded signal cable must be used in system loop, and must be grounded firmly.
sentences.chinese: 在系统回路中必须采用屏蔽信号电缆，并可靠接地。

sentences.english: B4C coating is not fit for shield fast neutrons.
sentences.chinese: B4C涂层不适合屏蔽快中子。

definition: to ban (narcotics, a movie etc)/to block (a road etc)/(Internet) to block (a user)
to send to multiple recipients/mass mailout/to occur in a clustered fashion
to pry into or spy on/to snoop/to peep/to poke one's nose into/to peer/to get a glimpse of
